CustomField.formula: OR(IF(( Unit_Net_Price__c - PTS_Line_Item__r.Budget_Amount_Per_item__c ) > (0.05 * PTS_Line_Item__r.Budget_Amount_Per_item__c ), true, false), IF(( Unit_Net_Price__c - PTS_Line_Item__r.Budget_Amount_Per_item__c ) > (1000), true, false))
CustomField.label: Return To PR For Approval
